register.title: Register
register.usernameMinLength: Username must be at least 3 characters
register.passwordMinLength: Password must be at least 6 characters

workload.formulaOverallCompletion: Input: all issues in selected sprint. For each issue: estimatedHours (Backlog), status, and category → TaskType. If status is Closed: ratio 100% (category ignored). Otherwise phase ratio by TaskType: Req 20%, Dev 60%, Testing 80%, UAT 80%, Release 100%. Formula: (Σ estimatedHours × ratio) / (Σ estimatedHours) × 100, capped 0–100%.
workload.formulaOverallCompletionInput: Input: All issues in selected sprint. Each issue: estimatedHours (Backlog), status (Closed vs others), category → TaskType (Req, Dev, Testing, UAT, Release).
workload.formulaOverallCompletionExpression: Formula: (Σ estimatedHours × ratio) / (Σ estimatedHours) × 100, capped 0–100%. If status Closed → ratio 100%; otherwise ratio from category (Req 0%, Dev 20%, Testing 60%, UAT 80%, Release 80%).
workload.formulaOverallCompletionRatio: Phase ratio: Req 0%, Dev 20%, Testing 60%, UAT 80%, Release 80%. Task with status Closed uses 100%, category ignored.
workload.formulaEstimateCompleted: Σ estimatedHours of closed issues / Σ estimatedHours of all issues in sprint. completed = total estimate (hours) of closed tasks, total = total estimate of all tasks.
workload.formulaEstimateCompletedInput: Input: All issues in selected sprint (estimatedHours per issue).
workload.formulaEstimateCompletedExpression: Formula: Σ estimatedHours of closed issues / Σ estimatedHours of all issues. Display: completed = sum for closed, total = sum for all.
workload.formulaTasksCompleted: Closed count / Total count. Regular tasks (non-Gtask) in sprint.
workload.formulaTasksCompletedInput: Input: All issues in selected sprint.
workload.formulaTasksCompletedExpression: Formula: Count(Closed) / Count(all). Display: completed = closed count, total = total count.
workload.formulaUspCompleted: Σ(point) of closed tasks / Σ(point) of all tasks. Regular tasks; point from custom field.
workload.formulaUspCompletedInput: Input: All issues in selected sprint. Point from custom field per issue.
workload.formulaUspCompletedExpression: Formula: Σ(point) of closed / Σ(point) of all. Display: completed = points closed, total = points all.
workload.keyAchievementsPlaceholder: Enter notable achievements for this week...
workload.errorLoadingData: An error occurred while loading data

qualityKpi.removalEfficiencySubLabel: Internal bugs weighted / All bugs weighted
qualityKpi.defectDensityImproved: Defect density improved 15% from last sprint

customerValue.noPerformanceData: No performance data available for the selected time period
customerValue.busyRateMemberDescription: Data from ACMS by Day / Week / Month per Member, Project, Division (Hades 1, Hades 2, Faderless, Bonne). Effort Deviation = Actual Effort / Calendar Effort.
customerValue.performanceMemberDescription: Data from Backlog by Sprint / Milestone / Project / Division for closed tasks. Performance by Estimate = Estimated Effort / (Actual Effort × Rank coefficient); same for Re-Estimate and Point.

velocity.hoursEstimateBySprint: Hours estimate by sprint (Gtask + Task, closed)
velocity.uspEstimateBySprint: USP (point) estimate by sprint (Gtask + Task, closed)
velocity.errorLoadingData: An error occurred while loading data

progressOverview.title: Project Progress Overview
progressOverview.description: Real-time snapshot of task distribution and bottlenecks from Backlog.
progressOverview.errorLoadingData: Failed to load data from Backlog API.

settings.title: Settings
settings.description: Configure dashboard and feature toggles for the whole application.
settings.showBacklogLinksDescription: Show "View in Backlog" links on Progress Overview (UAT and Release cards).
settings.backlogProjectDescription: Select which project to use for Backlog links. Stored in browser.
